SuperMario game project

Instructions

Click on flag to start. Use keyboard arrows to move.

Extending game

Starter project for super mario game. Project contains all essential elements required to build mario game.

Possible improvements:

  • Add logic to opponent
  • Add logic to power up item
  • Add logic for collecting points
  • Extend platform
  • Add more clouds
